entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `listId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `brand` TEXT NOT NULL, `model` TEXT NOT NULL, `parameters` TEXT NOT NULL, `barcode` TEXT NOT NULL, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `unit` TEXT NOT NULL, `location` TEXT NOT NULL, `remark` TEXT NOT NULL, `lastModified` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`listId`) REFERENCES `inventory_lists`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `displayOrder` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastModified` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isDefault` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_inventory_lists_displayOrder
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_inventory_lists_displayOrder` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`displayOrder`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`name` TEXT NOT NULL, `brand` TEXT NOT NULL, `model` TEXT NOT NULL, `barcode` TEXT NOT NULL, `location` TEXT NOT NULL, `remark` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`inventory_items`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_inventory_items_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `inventory_items` BEGIN DELETE FROM `inventory_items_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_inventory_items_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `inventory_items` BEGIN DELETE FROM `inventory_items_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_inventory_items_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `inventory_items` BEGIN INSERT INTO `inventory_items_fts`(`docid`, `name`, `brand`, `model`, `barcode`, `location`, `remark`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`, NEW.`brand`, NEW.`model`, NEW.`barcode`, NEW.`location`, NEW.`remark`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_inventory_items_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `inventory_items` BEGIN INSERT INTO `inventory_items_fts`(`docid`, `name`, `brand`, `model`, `barcode`, `location`, `remark`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`, NEW.`brand`, NEW.`model`, NEW.`barcode`, NEW.`location`, NEW.`remark`); END
